theclientsuitabilitytestisdesi: The client suitability test is designed to test your knowledge of Forex  and CFDs and whether or not they are suitable products for you. In order to pass  the client suitability test you needed to score at least 70% or 7 out of 10. You  are permitted to attempt the test three times. If you fail the test after  all three attempts you will not be able to sit the test again for 48 hours.
